sentence.content: In order to confront the Black Group or LOD, which are nothing but Shining Path militants who sign Abimael Guzman&apost;s letters and uphold his "great decision and definition" to negotiate with the government in order to end the war, the Central Committee demands that the militants "grow stronger on the Basis for Partisan Unity ," which is the Shining Path basic principles adopted during the 1988 Congress, and "arrange for conquering power in the midst of the people&apost;s war."
